profile: Welcome to Joyce Heating Service Ltd. We are a family owned and operated heating business established in 1959. We service and repair all makes and models of gas and oil furnaces. As well as install furnaces, hot water heaters, gas tank-less water heaters, Heat pumps and air conditioning, gas fitting and hook up of gas stoves, gas ranges, gas cook tops, gas barbecues/BBQ, gas fire pits, gas outdoor heaters, and some small sheet metal work across most of the Lower Mainland.

profile:
TEK Climate Heating and Airconditioning. Is a full service heating, ventilation, air-conditioning, gas fitting and refrigeration company. We can take care of all your HVAC/R needs including sheet metal.

We take on everything from small residential installations and service to large commercial installations and service.

We specialize in furnace installations, air conditioning installations, hot water tank installations, tankless installations, heat pump installations, Boiler installations, ductless mini split installations and system installations. We are based in Maple Ridge but cover the entire lower mainland. We also complete furnace repairs, air conditioning repairs, hot water tank repairs, tankless repairs, heat pump repairs, Boiler repairs, ductless mini split repairs and system repairs.
 
Our experience with all types of HVAC/R equipment means we competently service and install all of your equipment. Including, but not limited to furnaces, air-conditioning units, heat pumps, geo-thermal heat pumps, roof top units, ductless splits, tankless on demand hot water heaters, hot water tanks, ventilation equipment, kitchen/restaurant equipment, walk-in coolers, display coolers and building automation systems.
Customer satisfaction is #1 to us. Whether you are a builder, business owner or home owner we work with you to ensure you get exactly what you need. We are committed to providing excellent service and value. Having a great relationship with our wholesalers means we get the best pricing on equipment and can pass that down to the customer.  
 
Chris, owner operator, has 14 years experience in the HVAC/R trade. His vast knowledge and experience in the trade enables TEK Climate Control Systems LTD. To complete all jobs with confidence and personally guarantees all work done by his business.
All of our staff are highly qualified and take great pride in their work. We strive to perform high quality workmanship, Installing only quality products and materials.

profile:
For all your heating, cooling and refrigeration. Call us now. We service repair and install equipment of all brands, whether you are a commercial or residential customer.
.
KNOWLEDGE HVAC & REFRIGERATION LTD is a full service Heating, Ventilation, Air Conditioning, Refrigeration and Mechanical company currently servicing Vancouver, Lower Mainland and Fraser Valley area. We are Licensed, Bonded and Insured, we offer a wide range of services to Commercial and Residential customers.

HVAC installations (residential and commercial)

Refrigeration equipment installations
Maintenance, service & repair of heating, cooling and refrigeration equipment
Electrical services
HVAC and Refrigeration equipment maintenance program 
Gas fitting
At KNOWLEDGE HVAC & REFRIGERATION LTD we focus on equipment safety, rules and manufacturer specifications. We are known for Safety First, Quality Work and Timely Completion. Our Technicians are fully licensed, factory trained and extremely knowledgeable. The majority of our clients are from referrals.

What makes us different from other companies?

We are committed to our customers safety and satisfaction. We currently have Technicians with over fifteen years of experience, who are trained past student of JARTS and BCIT.

We are detailed, careful and considerate while working and double-check that every step has been taken to ensure a thorough and complete job. We take pride in our work on a daily basis. No matter what we are working on, from commercial to residential installation, repairs and servicing, no job is unimportant to us.

MISSION STATEMENT:

To ensure our clients achieve operational efficiency in every aspect of their heating, cooling and refrigeration requirements in a reliable, economic and timely manner.
To be committed to safety, quality and excellence service while attaining standards beyond the expectations of our customers.
To perform for our customers the highest level of quality services at fair and market competitive prices.
To ensure the longevity of our company through repeat and referral business achieved by customer satisfaction in all areas including timeliness, attention to detail and service-minded attitudes.
To maintain the highest levels of professionalism, integrity, honesty and fairness in our relationships with our suppliers, professional associates and customers.
.
.
Follow us on Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/KnowledgeHvacR/

profile:
At Reliance Home Comfort (formerly Canada Furnace), the safety and well-being of both our Customers and our Team Members is always our top priority. We are actively monitoring the Coronavirus (COVID-19) situation and are taking precautionary measures to aid in keeping our communities safe. We have implemented strict safety protocols to provide both our Customers and Team members with peace of mind during this challenging time. We continue to provide the exceptional customer experiences we are so well known for and want you to know that we are here for you when you need us.

To help with prevention, we are taking the following precautionary measures to protect our Customers.

Our Team Members have been equipped with an ample supply of:

* Hand sanitizers
* Disinfectant wipes
* Masks
* Single-use gloves
* Boot covers

We know that this is a difficult time for all and we want you to know that we will be there for you and are taking all the necessary precautions to keep you and your family comfortable and safe.

Canada Furnace is one of the biggest and most well established heating and air conditioning companies in greater Vancouver and the entire lower mainland. We provide full service and installation on all of your heating, cooling, plumbing, water heater and air purification systems. Established in 1981 we pride ourselves for a high level of customer service to match our extremely helpful and well trained technicians.
888-837-1451 is a TOLL FREE No., please feel free to contact!!

profile:
About Us
From our Family to yours!
 As a family business serving Vancouver and the Lower Mainland, we would like to take this opportunity to introduce ourselves.  With over 17 years of experience in the Heating and Plumbing Service Industry we look forward to servicing all the needs of you and Greater Vancouver.  As a fully licensed gas contractor we have lots of experience repairing and servicing heating systems from Residential to Commercial.  Our diagnostic skills are second to none. It's rare that we can't find the issue, repair the issue correctly the first time and provide you with an on-site quote for any other services or repairs needed.  As a first time customer, Sureguard would love to offer you a FREE inspection of your in-home or commercial heating system.  When you give us an opportunity to service your needs you will not find better, more honest, or reliable service than Sureguard Testing's technicians.  We will give you peace of mind.  We learned a long time ago that honesty, integrity and hard work will make for a successful working relationship with any customer. 

We're social here:
https://www.facebook.com/Sureguard-Testing-HeatingPlumbingBackflow-297759447434326/
products:
Navien
Navien, the Leader in the hot water on-demand technology.  This product gives you reliable hot water at your fingertips as well as saving you on your gas bill.  But it doesn't stop there.  Navien, being so efficient, has an ultra low NOx emission.  So when you look for a reliable and environmentally safe unit, choose Navien. Sureguard installs many of their products such as the Navien NPE in all its classes.  We also love combining your boiler and hot water tank into one unit called the Navien NCB Combination Boiler.  This wall hung unit will clear up all that wasted space and leaves your mechanical room looking great!

How will I know if I am able to have a Navien?
There are many factors to consider before booking an appointment for a Navien.  If you own a detached home the chances of install are greater.  Most Strata complexes, where the owner is responsible for the heating system, will allow a Navien install but some do not.  New style venting is possibly the biggest challenge before installation.  We would be more than happy to book an inspection to see if the installation is right for your home.

What would my cost savings be?
Cost savings will vary depending on what Navien product is the right fit for your home.  The average home with a Family of 4 with a 40 gal hot water tank uses around $350.00+ a year on gas.  The Navien reduces that cost by 2/3 weighing in at around $125+ per year.  8 years is the average life span of a hot water heater and in that time you would of spent up to $2800+ in gas consumption, whereas the Navien would be about $1000.  That's a saving of $1800+ not to mention you'd be replacing the hot water tank which would be an added expense.  So in short, Navien is the way to go!

Share the big news of Navien with a Friend!
Wouldn't you like a FREE Navien?  Each time you refer a friend and they book a Navien Installation, Sureguard will give you money back towards your Navien purchase!  Call for more Details.
services:
Our Heating Service includes: All models of boilers, furnaces, fireplaces, hot water tanks, heat exchangers, gas valves & gas appliances. We are also known for our expertise at installing hot water on-demand systems. We also repair & install them!

Plumbing Service & Repair

Our Plumbing Service includes: Toilets, faucets, garburators, drain cleaning, cartridge replacement, perimeter drain cleaning, sewer back ups, sewage pumps, leak repair and so much more!
 

Backflow Testing & Installation

Backflow testing:  We do annual backflow testing as well as service & installation of the devices.
 

Legalizing Basement Suites

Have a basement suite in need of some upgrades?

We install Duct Style Smoke Detectors on your furnace as well as Fire Dampers on all of your ducting outlets to ensure fire separation between suites.  This is a simple process in which we can prevent fire spreading throughout your home giving you more time to evacuate your Family in case of a fire.

Gas Service & Repair

Our Gas Services include: Meter re-connections, BBQ Boxes, Range hook up,  Gas Leak Detection & Regulator Replacement.  Let us be your Gas Guys!

Strata & Restaurant Service

Our Strata Services include:  Preventative Maintenance Programs, parkade hydro flushing, leak repair, stack cleaning, rooftop units, parkade exhaust fans, sanitary lift stations, commercial hot water tanks, boiler service, backflow testing and any other heating & plumbing needs your building or restaurant may have!
warranty_terms: Yes. 1 Year on Workmanship. Depends on service provided.

profile:
BC Redi-Rooter Ltd is a full-service company specializing in all aspects of plumbing for commercial, residential and multi-family housing, we also offer plumbing in Mission, Abbotsford and surrounding areas and drain cleaning in Mission, Abbotsford and surrounding areas.

We are a family- owned and operated company with over 35 years of combined experience in the Plumbing industry. Over the years we have progressed in our success with professionalism, integrity, honesty and our dedication to taking pride in our workmanship. With dedication and confidence, we guarantee our workmanship and materials.

For your convenience, we offer 24-hour emergency service and for your protection we are fully insured and have a staff made up of licensed and experienced plumbing technicians.

We are also certified as a Green Plumber which not only enables us to advise customers of the best to way to protect the environment but also show them how to save money and apply for any rebates that may be available.

Whether you need a leaky pipe fixed, a toilet installed, or a new hot water tank. Give BC Redi Rooter a call. 

Plumbers in Mission and Abbotsford, Maple Ridge, Langley, Pitt Meadows, Chilliwack, Aldergrove, Cloverdale, Fort Langley, Hatzic, Deroche, Lake Errock, Sumas, Steelhead, Lower Mainland, Fraser Valley, Golden Ears, Nicomem, Hayward, Silverdale, Sumas Mountain, Dewdney, Ferndale, Whonnock, Kanaka, Aloutte, Vedder, Yale, Rosedale, Whatcom
